attributes.action: Stop the Welney Wash flooding the A1101
attributes.additional_details: This stops large volumes of traffic using longer routes and damaging other roadways. Businesses losing income and reduced fuel costs by taking longer routes into Ely. Local business are losing income.
attributes.background: Stop the Welney Wash flooding on the A1101 and for the highways to build a bridge or introduce flood barriers. This stops large volumes of traffic using longer routes and damaging other roadways. Businesses losing income and reduced fuel costs by taking longer routes into Ely.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Cambridgeshire Council Council.

You can find out how to petiiton the council here - 

https://www.cambridgeshire.gov.uk/council/meetings-and-decisions/petitions
